alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:08PM CDT until May 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Craighead County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... West central Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marked Tree, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Trumann, Marked Tree, Lake City, Lepanto, Caraway, Tyronza, Dyess, Etowah, Black Oak, Victoria, Three Way, Payneway, West Ridge, Eastview, Lennie, Tulot, Hatchie Coon, Stewart, Dub and Mandalay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
